Text: Updated Dun Bradstreet Data Cc PST RESCHEDULED Thanks for your patience At this meeting Dun Bradstreet representative Karen Marcom will provide an overview of the Dun Bradstreet marketing data that Enron will have access to through a global purchase agreement This data set is a monthly feed of marketing information financial stress scores energy demand estimators family tree linkage and DB credit scores which is a subset of the full DB database Karen will answer questions concerning the presentation of the data and how it will be accessed The Dun Bradstreet database will be available to business units sharing in the cost of the database
